name: Deep Dive (Neshtyak)
description:
On the way to the underwater station, our submarine crashed, and now breakdowns make themselves felt every 10 seconds! Get to the station, overcoming breakdowns and fuel leaks

Controls:

  • WASD - control of the submarine / character
  • Spacebar - exit or enter the submarine when it has stopped
  • E - pick up a crystal for fuel by swimming to it
  • Use the mouse and keyboard arrows to complete repair tasks, depending on the task
